text: C++ or Python for C# programmer?
I am a corporate C# programmer.
I found some time to invest into myself and stumbed upon a dilemma.
C#/.NET is easy to learn, develop for, etc.
In future I would want to apply to Microsoft or Google, and want to invest spare time wisely, so what I will learn will flourish in future.
So: Python or C++ for a C# programmer?
I am a little scared of C++ because developing anything in it takes ages.
Python is easy, but I take it as a child-play language, which still need lots of patching to be some mature development tool/language.
Any C# developers having same dilemma?
